text:
"We Belong Together" is a 2005 hit song by Mariah Carey off of her album "The Emancipation of Mimi". The song is available in several versions. It reached #1 on the "Billboard" Hot 100 and stayed there for 14 weeks. With the song, Carey holds the record for having the longest-running and second-longest running songs at #1 in the US (her song "One Sweet Day" with Boyz II Men stayed on top for 16 weeks).
It was also No.1 in Australia and the Netherlands. It was the best-selling song in the US of 2005 and later became "Billboard"<nowiki/>'s Song of the Decade for the 2000s (2000–09). It won two Grammy Awards.
